name: X/Twitter Real-Time Search API
description: Real-time X/Twitter search, trending topics, user profiles, tweet timelines, and thread extraction via mobile proxy. Replaces X API ($100-5000/mo) with micropayments.
longDescription: Full X/Twitter intelligence without the expensive API tier. Search tweets in real-time, track trending topics, extract user profiles with engagement metrics, fetch tweet timelines, and reconstruct full threads. All via mobile proxies that bypass X's aggressive rate limiting on non-authenticated requests.
whyMobileProxy: X/Twitter imposes extreme rate limits on unauthenticated requests and blocks datacenter IPs entirely. The official API starts at $100/mo (Basic) with strict quotas, and the Pro tier ($5000/mo) is required for search. Mobile carrier IPs bypass these restrictions by appearing as legitimate X app users on cellular networks, providing reliable access without API key quotas.

search.tweets: Tweet[] — id, text, author, likes, retweets, replies, timestamp, media[], hashtags[]

competitive.ourAdvantage: Real-time X data at $0.005-0.02/request with no monthly minimum. Full search, trending, profiles, timelines, and threads. Pay only for what you use via x402 micropayments.

limitations: Protected/private accounts return limited public data
Search results limited by X's non-authenticated view (recent tweets, not full history)
Rate limited to 20 proxy requests/minute per client IP
Trending topics are location-dependent (defaults to US/global)
Media URLs in tweets may expire

/api/x/search.description: Search tweets by keyword, hashtag, or advanced query

/api/x/user/:handle.description: Get user profile with follower/following counts

/api/x/user/:handle/tweets.description: Get user's recent tweets with engagement metrics
